attributes.action: Sack the Home Secretary for the removal of Professor Knutt who was fulfilling his obligations as laid down in the misuse of drugs act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The drugs debate is not what this petition is about. It is about accountability for making decisions which are made within the framework of the law and which are politically motivated populist policies made on the hoof by the successor to Jackie Smith who obviously never watched porn on ketamine.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
